ActAn Act to amend the National Defence Act, the Criminal Code, the Sex Offender Information Registration Act and the Criminal Records Act
SubjectAn Act to amend the National Defence Act, the Criminal Code, the Sex Offender Information Registration Act and the Criminal Records Act
PrecisOrder fixing SEPTEMBER 12, 2008 as the day on which AN ACT TO AMEND THE NATIONAL DEFENCE ACT, THE CRIMINAL CODE, THE SEX OFFENDER INFORMATION REGISTRATION ACT AND THE CRIMINAL RECORDS ACT, being chapter 5 of the Statutes of Canada, 2007, comes into force. [Bill S-3]
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2008-0093 Publication Date: 2008-09-17
AttachmentsAttachment
act: An Act to amend the National Defence Act, the Criminal Code, the Sex Offender Information Registration Act and the Criminal Records Act
subject: An Act to amend the National Defence Act, the Criminal Code, the Sex Offender Information Registration Act and the Criminal Records Act
precis:
Order fixing SEPTEMBER 12, 2008 as the day on which AN ACT TO AMEND THE NATIONAL DEFENCE ACT, THE CRIMINAL CODE, THE SEX OFFENDER INFORMATION REGISTRATION ACT AND THE CRIMINAL RECORDS ACT, being chapter 5 of the Statutes of Canada, 2007, comes into force.
[Bill S-3]
